titles.title: Condemning the selection of the Government of Iran to serve on the United Nations Commission on the Status of Women.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/19/2010--Introduced. Condemns the selection of the government of Iran to serve on the United Nations Commission on the Status of Women. Urges the President to direct the U.S. Permanent Representative to the United Nations to use U.S. influence at the United Nations (U.N.) to advocate for the government of Iran's removal from the Commission. Reaffirms the solidarity of the House of Representatives with the Iranian people in their struggle for freedom and human rights, including equal rights for women in Iran.
